list.res_body: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","properties":{"counts":{"type":"integer","description":"总记录数","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":100,"maximum":5000},"pagesize":{"type":"integer","description":"页大小","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":5,"maximum":50},"pages":{"type":"integer","description":"总页数","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":1,"maximum":100},"page":{"type":"integer","description":"当前页码","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":1,"maximum":100},"items":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"编号","mock":{"mock":"@id"}},"addTime":{"type":"string","description":"组题时间","mock":{"mock":"@datetime"}},"userName":{"type":"string","format":"ctitle","description":"用户名","mock":{"mock":"@cname"}},"questionIDs":{"type":"string","format":"ctitle","description":"试题ID","mock":{"mock":"@id"}},"progressOfAnswer":{"type":"integer","description":"答题进度","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":10,"maximum":100},"accuracyRate":{"type":"integer","description":"正确率","exclusiveMinimum":true,"minimum":10,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"maximum":100},"totalSeconds":{"type":"integer","description":"答题总耗时秒","exclusiveMinimum":true,"exclusiveMaximum":true,"minimum":100,"maximum":5000},"questionType":{"type":"string","format":"ctitle","description":"组题类型"}},"required":["id","addTime","userName","questionIDs","progressOfAnswer","accuracyRate","totalSeconds","questionType"]},"minItems":10,"maxItems":20,"uniqueItems":true,"description":"列表"}},"required":["counts","pagesize","pages","page","items"]}
